topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541fb407636872654b1d0000#post_541fb407636872654b1d0000
What state do you live in?


If I were in a zombie apocalypse I would be the bomb tech person.  Personally my favorite weapon would be something that make a siren noise for all day then after so many hours blows the entire fucking city block away.  It's the best zombie strategy when you think about it; attract their attention for that long then after a day of them all coming towards the bomb blow them all to pieces.  Sure there would be plenty left, but the zombies that could chase you would be gone.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541fbb406368727af60e0100#post_541fbb406368727af60e0100
My money is on she uses on Sakuya; Sakuya is a human, so I wouldn't be surprised if Remilia uses it to keep Sakuya from aging.


For those of you that are lost here's a image explaining what we're talking about:
!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/580/457/b8a.jpg!
Basically if you were in Touhou and you just outright fucked with the wrong people to the point you had a "wanted dead" bounty on you and they didn't use a friendly duel anymore they could instantly drop you dead no matter what super power you had; they could just go *pop* "you're dead" *EVEN* if you were god.
